workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.4378372697031872 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.2243677195609558 --weight-decay 0.0004569784173915895 --lr 2.9111956799706223e-05 --lr-scheduler inverse_sqrt --warmup-init-lr 1e-7 --min-lr 1e-9 --warmup-updates 149380 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.17572677035120257 --max-update 3500000 --max-epoch 15 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY --tensorboard-logdir $PHILLY_SCRATCH_DIRECTORY
